author: Ruby Foster
title: 10 Iconic Restaurants In North Dakota That Serve Outrageously Good Pizza
text:
Want to find iconic pizza restaurants in North Dakota with incredible food?
These 10 pizza places offer amazing flavors and memorable experiences!
1. The CraftCade – Pizza, Arcade, & Bar (Bismarck)
Who says you can’t have your pizza and play games too?
The CraftCade combines two of life’s greatest pleasures into one awesome experience.
This place brings back all those childhood memories of birthday parties at pizza joints.
Except now you’re old enough to appreciate both the games and the quality of the food.
The pizza here doesn’t play second fiddle to the entertainment.
These folks take their dough seriously and it shows in every single bite.
The crust has that perfect chew that makes you want to savor each piece slowly.
Their sauce recipe hits all the right notes without being too sweet or too tangy.
The cheese blend creates those Instagram-worthy cheese pulls that make everyone jealous.
You can build your own masterpiece with fresh toppings that actually taste like real food.
The arcade games range from classic pinball machines to modern video games.
You might find yourself in a heated competition over Pac-Man while waiting for your order.
The bar serves up cold drinks that pair perfectly with hot pizza slices.
Nothing beats washing down a great slice with your favorite beverage.
The atmosphere buzzes with laughter and the sounds of games being played.
Kids run around having the time of their lives while parents actually enjoy themselves too.
Date nights become way more fun when you can challenge each other to air hockey.
The staff keeps everything running smoothly so you can focus on having a good time.
Where: 405 N 4th St, Bismarck, ND 58501
2. Nardello’s Pizza (Bismarck)
Sometimes the best pizza comes from the most humble places.
Nardello’s Pizza sits in a strip mall, but don’t let that fool you.
This place knows how to make a pizza that will make your taste buds dance.
The crust here strikes that perfect balance between crispy and chewy.
You know the kind – where each bite gives you that satisfying crunch on the outside.
Then your teeth sink into that soft, pillowy center that makes you close your eyes and smile.
The sauce tastes like it came straight from someone’s Italian grandmother’s kitchen.
It’s got that perfect blend of herbs and spices that makes you want to lick the plate clean.
The cheese melts into golden pools of deliciousness that stretch when you pull a slice away.
You’ll find yourself doing that cheese-pull thing just to watch it work its magic.
The pepperoni curls up at the edges and gets those little crispy spots that add extra flavor.
Each piece of sausage tastes like it was seasoned by someone who really cares about their craft.
The staff here treats every customer like they’re part of the family.
They remember your order after just a few visits and always greet you with genuine smiles.
The dining room might not win any design awards, but it’s clean and comfortable.
You’ll see families sharing large pizzas while kids color on paper placemats.
Local workers grab quick slices during their lunch breaks because they know good food when they taste it.
The prices won’t make your wallet cry, which means you can come back again and again.
Where: 1001 W Interstate Ave, Suite 112, Bismarck, ND 58503
3. Fireflour Pizzeria & Coffee Bar (Bismarck)
Coffee and pizza might sound like an odd combination, but trust us on this one.
Fireflour Pizzeria proves that some of the best ideas come from thinking outside the box.
This place serves up artisan pizzas that would make any food critic take notice.
The wood-fired oven creates that smoky flavor that you just can’t get from regular ovens.
Each pizza comes out with those beautiful charred spots that add extra taste and texture.
The dough gets made fresh daily and you can actually taste the difference.
It’s got that perfect balance of crispy edges and tender center that makes pizza lovers weep with joy.
The sauce tastes bright and fresh, like tomatoes that were picked at the peak of ripeness.
They use high-quality cheese that melts into creamy perfection without getting greasy.
The toppings selection includes both classic favorites and creative combinations.
You might find yourself trying flavor combinations you never thought would work together.
The coffee program here rivals any specialty coffee shop in town.
You can start your meal with a perfectly crafted latte and end with a great slice.
The atmosphere feels modern and welcoming without being pretentious or stuffy.
Local art decorates the walls and creates conversation starters while you wait.
The staff knows their stuff and can recommend both pizza and coffee pairings.
They’re passionate about what they do and it shows in every interaction.
Where: 111 N 5th St, Bismarck, ND 58501
4. Amici Pizza Company (Bismarck)
The name means “friends” in Italian, and that’s exactly how you’ll feel here.
Amici Pizza Company creates an atmosphere where everyone feels welcome and appreciated.
The pizza here follows traditional Italian methods with a modern North Dakota twist.
Each pie gets hand-stretched to order, so you know it’s fresh and made just for you.
The crust achieves that perfect texture that’s both substantial and light at the same time.
You won’t find yourself struggling with a thick, doughy mess that fills you up too quickly.
The sauce recipe balances sweetness and acidity in a way that complements every topping.
It’s not too heavy, so it doesn’t overpower the other flavors on your slice.
The cheese selection includes premium options that melt beautifully and taste incredible.
Each topping gets prepared with care and attention to quality over quantity.
The pepperoni has just the right amount of spice to wake up your taste buds.
Fresh vegetables add color and crunch that makes each bite interesting and satisfying.
The dining room feels warm and inviting with comfortable seating for groups of any size.
Families gather around large tables while couples enjoy intimate dinners at smaller spots.
The service strikes that perfect balance between attentive and giving you space to enjoy your meal.
Staff members genuinely care about your experience and want you to leave happy.
The prices reflect the quality of ingredients without breaking your budget.
You’ll find yourself planning your next visit before you even finish your current slice.
Where: 3001 Yorktown Drive, Suite 6, Bismarck, ND 58503
5. Jonny B’s Brickhouse (Jamestown)
This historic brick building houses some of the most satisfying pizza in central North Dakota.
Jonny B’s Brickhouse combines old-world charm with seriously good food that keeps people coming back.
The building itself tells a story of Jamestown’s past while serving up modern comfort food.
Walking inside feels like stepping into a place where good times and great food meet.
The pizza here doesn’t mess around with fancy gimmicks or trendy ingredients.
Instead, they focus on doing the basics really, really well.
The crust has that perfect chew that makes you want to eat every last crumb.
It’s substantial enough to hold all the toppings without falling apart in your hands.
The sauce tastes like it simmered all day to develop those deep, rich flavors.
Each spoonful adds the perfect amount of moisture and taste to complement the other ingredients.
The cheese melts into golden perfection that stretches and pulls in all the right ways.
You’ll find yourself doing that thing where you twirl the cheese around your finger.
The pepperoni cups up beautifully and creates little pools of spicy oil that add extra flavor.
Sausage gets seasoned with herbs and spices that make each bite a little adventure.
The atmosphere buzzes with conversation and laughter from locals who consider this their second home.
You’ll see the same faces week after week because people know quality when they find it.
The staff treats everyone like regulars, even if it’s your first time walking through the door.
Where: 215 1st Ave S, Jamestown, ND 58401
6. Blackbird Wood Fire Pizza (Fargo)
Wood-fired pizza brings out flavors that regular ovens just can’t match.
Blackbird Wood Fire Pizza proves that sometimes the old ways really are the best ways.
The wood-fired oven creates temperatures that make magic happen to pizza dough.

Each pie comes out with those beautiful leopard spots that show it was cooked properly.
The high heat creates a crust that’s crispy on the outside and tender on the inside.
You get that perfect contrast of textures that makes each bite exciting and satisfying.
The sauce tastes bright and fresh because the high heat concentrates all the flavors.
It doesn’t get watery or soggy like sauce from regular ovens sometimes does.
The cheese bubbles and browns in spots that add extra depth and richness.
Those little charred bits of cheese become the best parts of each slice.
The toppings get kissed by the flames and develop flavors you can’t get any other way.
Vegetables caramelize slightly while meats develop crispy edges that add texture and taste.
The atmosphere feels casual and welcoming despite the sophisticated cooking methods.
You can watch the pizza makers work their magic through the open kitchen design.
The staff knows their craft and can explain how the wood-fired process makes everything better.
They’re passionate about their work and love sharing that enthusiasm with customers.
The prices reflect the quality and care that goes into each handcrafted pizza.
Where: 206 Broadway N, Fargo, ND 58102
7. Rhombus Guys (Fargo)
This downtown Fargo location brings big city pizza vibes to the heart of North Dakota.
Rhombus Guys has built a reputation for consistently great pizza that never disappoints.
The crust here achieves that perfect balance between New York thin and Chicago thick.
It’s sturdy enough to hold generous toppings but light enough that you won’t feel stuffed.
Each bite gives you that satisfying chew that makes you slow down and savor the experience.
The sauce recipe hits all the right notes without being too sweet or too acidic.
It complements the other ingredients instead of competing with them for attention.
The cheese blend creates those picture-perfect stretches that make your mouth water.
You’ll find yourself taking photos of your pizza just to capture those cheese pulls.
The topping selection includes both classic combinations and creative specialty options.
Fresh ingredients make all the difference in how each pizza tastes and looks.
The pepperoni curls up perfectly and develops those crispy edges that add extra flavor.
Vegetables stay crisp and colorful instead of turning into mushy afterthoughts.
The downtown location buzzes with energy from office workers, students, and families.
Large windows let in natural light that makes the dining room feel open and welcoming.
The staff moves efficiently during busy times while still providing friendly service.
They remember regular customers and their favorite orders, which makes everyone feel special.
Where: 606 Main Ave, Fargo, ND 58103
8. Pizza Corner Restaurant (Valley City)
Sometimes the best pizza comes from the most unexpected places in small-town North Dakota.
Pizza Corner Restaurant proves that great food doesn’t need a big city address to shine.
This local favorite has been serving up consistently delicious pizza that keeps families coming back.
The crust here has that homemade quality that reminds you of pizza from your childhood.
It’s got just the right amount of chew and crispiness to make each bite satisfying.
The edges get golden brown and slightly crispy while the center stays tender and flavorful.
The sauce tastes like it was made by someone who really cares about getting it right.
It’s got that perfect balance of herbs and spices that makes you want to lick your fingers.
The cheese melts evenly and creates those beautiful golden spots that photograph so well.
Each slice pulls away cleanly without leaving a mess of toppings behind.
The pepperoni has just enough spice to wake up your taste buds without overwhelming them.
Sausage gets seasoned with care and adds hearty flavor to every bite it touches.
The atmosphere feels like a true community gathering place where everyone knows everyone.
Local families fill the booths while high school students grab slices after games.
The staff treats every customer like they’re part of the Valley City family.
They remember your usual order and ask about your kids by name.
The prices stay reasonable because they want everyone in town to be able to enjoy good pizza.
Where: 202 E Main St, Valley City, ND 58072
9. The Starving Rooster (Minot)
Don’t let the name fool you – nobody leaves this place hungry or disappointed.
The Starving Rooster serves up pizza that will make you forget all about chain restaurants.
This local gem focuses on quality ingredients and careful preparation that shows in every slice.
The crust gets made fresh daily and has that perfect texture that makes pizza lovers happy.
It’s got enough structure to hold generous toppings without becoming a soggy mess.
Each bite delivers that satisfying chew that makes you slow down and appreciate good food.
The sauce recipe balances all the right flavors without being too heavy or too light.
It adds moisture and taste without drowning out the other ingredients on your pizza.
The cheese selection includes premium options that melt beautifully and taste incredible.
You’ll see those perfect cheese stretches that make everyone at your table jealous.
The topping combinations range from classic favorites to creative specialty options.
Fresh vegetables add color and crunch while quality meats provide hearty satisfaction.
The atmosphere feels welcoming and comfortable without trying too hard to be trendy.
Local artwork decorates the walls and creates a sense of community pride.
The staff genuinely cares about your experience and wants you to leave with a smile.
They’re knowledgeable about the menu and can make recommendations based on your preferences.
The prices reflect the quality of ingredients while remaining accessible to local families.
Where: 30 1st St NE, Minot, ND 58703
10. New York To Go (Bismarck)
Sometimes you want that authentic New York pizza experience without leaving North Dakota.
New York To Go brings big city flavors to Bismarck with pizza that rivals the real deal.
The crust here achieves that classic New York thin style that folds perfectly in half.
It’s crispy on the bottom but still has enough chew to make each bite interesting.
The edges get golden and slightly charred in spots that add extra flavor and texture.
The sauce tastes bright and fresh with that perfect balance of herbs and spices.
It’s not too sweet like some pizza sauces, and it’s not too acidic either.
The cheese melts into those beautiful stretchy pulls that make your mouth water.
Each slice comes away cleanly with just the right amount of cheese and toppings.
The pepperoni has that classic curl and crispy edges that New York pizza lovers expect.
Other toppings get distributed evenly so every bite has the perfect combination of flavors.
The atmosphere feels casual and fast-paced like a real New York pizza joint.
You can grab a quick slice for lunch or order a whole pie for dinner.
The staff moves efficiently during busy times while still providing friendly service.
They understand that sometimes you want great pizza without a lot of fuss or waiting.
The prices stay reasonable despite the premium quality and authentic preparation methods.
You’ll find yourself craving that New York pizza experience more often than you expected.
Where: 820 43rd Ave NE #124, Bismarck, ND 58503
North Dakota’s iconic pizza restaurants prove that legendary food comes from passionate people who care about their craft.
These ten spots will create memories that last long after your last bite!
